DOC.brief_summary: Aim study find live online course effective regard health promotion . Older adult receive support initiate health behavior ( i.e. , enhance physical activity improve food habit ) . Motivation , confidence self-management strategy optimize make sure participant able integrate physical activity healthy diet daily life .
DOC.brief_title: Liveonline Training Course Improve Food Habits Enhance Physical Activity Older Adults
DOC.detailed_description: Aim study support old adult define personal health behavior ( enhance physical activity , improve food habit ) , check optimize intention regard self-efficacy volitional competency , action cop planning , disability management adopt maintain behavior successfully . Research question : - What pathway health information/intention behavioural change ( motivational volitional process ) ? - Which crucial social-cognitive variable educating/coaching adult low health literacy daily self-management ? - Which resource ( e.g . social support ) target intervention empower people health behaviour change maintenance ?
